name: Versavyra - Ink To Aeon - Chapter 1 Demo
name_original: Versavyra - Ink To Aeon - Chapter 1 Demo
description:
Versavyra Ink to Aeon is a 16-bit JRPG being developed by Ejecty in RPG Maker MZ. This is the Chapter 1 demo created to garner feedback and suggestions.

Playtime: 1-2 hours

Please take our short survey after completion

https://forms.gle/3ASrGWjJ1fyt2qUT7
